languages.text: "Мой технобрат настоял на своем участии в вылазке. Для него это — столь же приоритетная миссия, как и для меня. Мы оба ожидаем встречи с наставником Амарнатом".
"My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Мой технобрат настоял на своем участии в вылазке. Для него это — столь же приоритетная миссия, как и для меня. Мы оба ожидаем встречи с наставником Амарнатом".

traits.locale_text: "My tech-brother insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「技術同胞はこの遠征への参加を強く希望していました。これは自分と同様、彼にとっても重要な聖務です。自分たちは師、アマルナトに会うつもりです」
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「技術同胞はこの遠征への参加を強く希望していました。これは自分と同様、彼にとっても重要な聖務です。自分たちは師、アマルナトに会うつもりです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我的技术伙伴坚持要加入这次旅行。对我和他来说，这件事情都是首要任务，我们都很期待与我们的导师阿玛纳特会面。”
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “我的技术伙伴坚持要加入这次旅行。对我和他来说，这件事情都是首要任务，我们都很期待与我们的导师阿玛纳特会面。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mon technoconfrère a insisté pour participer à cette excursion. Cette mission est aussi prioritaire pour lui que pour moi. Nous devons tous les deux rencontrer notre mentor, Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Mon technoconfrère a insisté pour participer à cette excursion. Cette mission est aussi prioritaire pour lui que pour moi. Nous devons tous les deux rencontrer notre mentor, Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi tecnocamarada insistió en unirse a esta excursión. Esta misión es tan importante para él como para mí, pues ambos queremos encontrar a nuestro mentor, Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Mi tecnocamarada insistió en unirse a esta excursión. Esta misión es tan importante para él como para mí, pues ambos queremos encontrar a nuestro mentor, Amarnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Techkamerad hat darauf bestanden, Teil dieser Exkursion zu sein. Für ihn ist das ebenso sehr eine priorisierte Mission wie für mich. Wir erwarten beide, unserem Mentor zu begegnen, Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Techkamerad hat darauf bestanden, Teil dieser Exkursion zu sein. Für ihn ist das ebenso sehr eine priorisierte Mission wie für mich. Wir erwarten beide, unserem Mentor zu begegnen, Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Tekno yoldaşım, bu yolculuğun bir parçası olmakta ısrarcıydı. Benim olduğu kadar onun için de öncelikli bir görev bu. İkimiz de yönderimiz Amarnat'ı görmeyi beklemekteyiz."
languages.original_text: "My tech-comrade insisted on taking part in this excursion. This is as much of a priority mission for him as it is for me. We are both expecting to meet our mentor, Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno yoldaşım bu yolculuğun bir parçası olmakta ısrarcıydı. Bu, benim olduğu kadar onun için de öncelikli bir görev. İkimiz de yönderimiz Amarnat'la karşılaşmayı beklemekteyiz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
